item.title: Volleyball Aces Beeswarm
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.3.6 ✔ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✔ tibble 3.1.8 ✔ dplyr 1.0.9 ## ✔ tidyr 1.2.0 ✔ stringr 1.4.1 ## ✔ readr 2.1.2 ✔ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggbeeswarm) library(ggrepel) set.seed(1234) aces <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dwillis/NCAAWomensVolleyballData/main/data/ncaa_womens_volleyball_playerstats_2022.csv') ## Rows: 5379 Columns: 32 ## ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## Delimiter: "," ## chr (7): team, full_name, roster_name, last_name, first_name, yr, pos ## dbl (23): season, jersey, feet, inches, gp, gs, mp, s, kills, errors, total_.
